mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ST_MNGR(USER_ID, USER_NM, AUTH_GROUP_CD, SECRET_NUM, REG_DT, MOD_DT, REGR_ID, MODR_ID, DEL_YN, USER_DIV) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userNm}, #{authGroupCd}, #{secretNum}, #{regDt}, #{modDt}, #{regrId}, #{modrId}, #{delYn}, #{userDiv});
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USER_NM, AUTH_GROUP_CD, SECRET_NUM, REG_DT, MOD_DT, REGR_ID, MODR_ID, DEL_YN, USER_DIV FROM ST_MNGR WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY REG_DT desc LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT USER_ID, USER_NM, AUTH_GROUP_CD, SECRET_NUM, REG_DT, MOD_DT, REGR_ID, MODR_ID, DEL_YN, USER_DIV FROM ST_MNGR WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM st_mngr WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE ST_MNGR SET USER_ID = #{userId}, USER_NM= #{userNm}, AUTH_GROUP_CD= #{authGroupCd}, SECRET_NUM= #{secretNum}, MOD_DT = #{modDt}, MODR_ID=#{modrId}, DEL_YN= 'N', USER_DIV= #{userDiv} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
